description: Card-style login form with shadow and accent color.
css: .login-form { background: transparent; box-shadow: none; border-radius: 0; padding: 0; margin: 0; width: 100%; display: grid; gap: 10px; } .login-form h2 { color: #1e293b; margin: 0 0 6px 0; font-size: 1rem; } .login-form input { width: 100%; border: 1px solid #cbd5e1; border-radius: 8px; padding: 10px 12px; box-sizing: border-box; } .login-form button { width: 100%; background: #1d4ed8; color: #fff; border: none; border-radius: 8px; padding: 10px 12px; cursor: pointer; font-weight: 600; }
